bug.author: MaxJohnsen
bug.summary: Collision sensor doesn't work on Tesla Model 3
bug.description: I can't seem to get the collision sensor to work when the hero vehicle is a Tesla Model 3. It works just fine when using other blueprints. I am using a fork of Carla, commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/commit/ab7a16687ab2841ef8d7e13d6a5a276ae72bbb3f>ab7a166</denchmark-link> (May 8 2019) Any suggestions?

comments.comment: This issue is still not fixed in newer versions of Carla, using Linux x86_64 5.5.6 and Carla 0.9.7.4. Model 3 still doesn't work with the collision sensor, simply changing the vehicle makes it the sensor work as expected.
